    • startShader

      @Null public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.ShaderProgram startShader(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch)
      Description copied from interface: ICanShader
      Starts the internal ShaderProrgram to be applied on future render calls.

      Ends the SpriteBatch, and starts a new one with the ShaderProgram and matrix applied.

      Returns the ShaderProgram that was in use prior to the new shader being applied.
      Specified by:
      startShader in interface ICanShader
      Returns:
      batch.getShader() before applying. Returns null if ICanShader.hasShader() is false.

    • endShader

      public void endShader(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.ShaderProgram originalShader)
      Description copied from interface: ICanShader
      Ends the ShaderProgram and SpriteBatch, and starts a new one with the original ShaderProgram applied.
      Specified by:
      endShader in interface ICanShader
      Parameters:
      batch - SpriteBatch which was present via batch.end(), before applying the new shader.
      originalShader - The original ShaderProgram which was present via batch.getShader(), before applying the new shader. This allows for the original shader to be applied back after the render functions are called.
